name: Starry Knight Ciel
effectText: If this card is in your hand: You can return 1 "Starry Knight" monster or 1 Level 7 LIGHT Dragon monster you control to the hand, except "Starry Knight Ciel"; Special Summon this card. If you control no monsters: You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 Level 7 LIGHT Dragon monster from your hand. You can only use each effect of "Starry Knight Ciel" once per turn.
